entry.title: Tuesday night: Clearing. Low minus 2.

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of drizzle. Low zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of drizzle changing to 30 percent chance of flurries before morning. Risk of freezing drizzle late in the evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023
